queries.name: All Shortest Paths to Domain (including Computers)

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((uc)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain {name: $result})) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths to no LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((uc)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND NOT uc = c AND c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users to Computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE u.hasspn = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE u.hasspn = true AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Owned Principals (including everything)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(a)) WHERE u.owned = true AND u <> a RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to Domain

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain)) WHERE o.owned = true AND d.name = $result RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE o.owned = true AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to no LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE NOT o = c AND o.owned = true AND c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from no Signing to Domain

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((c:Computer)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain)) WHERE c.hassigning = false AND d.name = $result RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from no Signing to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((c:Computer)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE NOT c = h AND c.hassigning = false AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Shortest Paths from Domain Users and Domain Computers (including everything)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((g:Group)-[r:{}*1..]->(a)) WHERE (g.objectid =~ $domain_users_id OR g.objectid =~ $domain_computers_id) AND g <> a RETURN p

queries.name: All Unconstrained Delegation Principals (excluding Domain Controllers and Administrators)

queryList.query: MATCH (dca)-[r:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ $domain_controllers_id OR g.objectid =~ $administrators_id WITH COLLECT(dca) AS exclude MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(uc) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND uc.unconstraineddelegation = true AND NOT uc IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: All Constrained Delegations

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: All Computers Allowed to Delegate for Another Computer

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c1:Computer)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: All ACLs to Computers (excluding High Value Targets)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (ucg)-[r]->(c:Computer) WHERE (ucg:User OR ucg:Computer OR ucg:Group) AND ucg.highvalue = false AND r.isacl = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Computers in Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admins group...
queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ $domain_admins_id RETURN g.name ORDER BY g.name ASC
MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf|HasSIDHistory*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name = $result RETURN p

queries.name: All Computers Local Admin to Another Computer

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c1:Computer)-[r1:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p UNION ALL MATCH p = (c3:Computer)-[r2:MemberOf|HasSIDHistory*1..]->(g:Group)-[r3:AdminTo]->(c4:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: All Computers without LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: All High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(h) WHERE h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(o) WHERE o.owned = true RETURN p

queries.name: Group Delegated Outbound Object Control of Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n {owned: true})-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r2 {isacl: true}]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Dangerous Rights for Groups under Domain Users

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' RETURN p

queries.name: All Users with Password in AD

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.userpassword IS NOT NULL RETURN p

queries.name: All Users with "Pass" in AD Description

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.description =~ '(?i).*pass.*' RETURN p

queries.name: All Users with Password not Required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.passwordnotreqd = true RETURN p

queries.name: All Users with with Same Name in Different Domains

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User),(u2:User) WHERE split(u1.name,'@')[0] = split(u2.name,'@')[0] AND u1.domain <> u2.domain AND tointeger(split(u1.objectid,'-')[7]) >= 1000 RETURN u1

queries.name: Set DCSync Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(d:Domain) WITH s, d MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) WITH s, d MATCH p = (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) AND a.highvalue = false SET s.highvalue = true, s.highvaluereason = 'DCSync Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Unconstrained Delegation Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(uc) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND uc.unconstraineddelegation = true AND a.highvalue = false SET uc.highvalue = true, uc.highvaluereason = 'Unconstrained Delegation Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Local Admin or Reset Password Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AdminTo|ForceChangePassword]->(b) AND a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Local Admin or Reset Password Principal' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Computers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AllowedToDelegate|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(n:Computer) AND a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on Computers' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Cert Publishers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|MemberOf|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ 'S-1-5-21-.*-517' AND a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on the Cert Publisher group' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Members of High Value Targets Groups as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE a.highvalue = false AND g.highvalue = true SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Member of High Value Target Group' RETURN a

queries.name: Remove Inactive Users and Computers from High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (uc) WHERE uc.highvalue = true AND ((uc:User AND uc.enabled = false) OR (uc:Computer AND ((uc.enabled = false) OR (uc.lastlogon > 0 AND uc.lastlogon < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000)) OR (uc.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND uc.lastlogontimestamp < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000))))) SET uc.highvalue = false, uc.nothighvaluereason = 'Inactive' RETURN uc
